title: Smoked salmon sushi rolls
ingredients: ['2 sheets nori (dry seaweed)', '195g uncooked medium grain white rice', '300ml water', '1 1/2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '85g cream cheese, cold, cut into thin strips, divided', '2 teaspoons crushed garlic, divided', '75g cashews, crushed, divided', '2 spring onions, finely chopped, divided', '50g smoked salmon, cut into strips, divided', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon wasabi paste']
